body:
Pulling master.tar.gz from the repository results in a different hash
any time a developer pushes.  Also, that tarball is a bit heavy because
the repository contains some presentations.  So now we use a static
tarball with docs stripped that is hosted at hpgmg.org.

Cc: @acfisher
title: hpgmg: use a stripped, static tarball and add debug/opt variants
